roleset.name: to arrange or manage as a broker

example.name: all arguments
example.text: However , even this admirable plan could become objectionable if the White House gives in to congressional Democratic pressure *trace* to add to the scope of the president 's initiative or *trace* to involve the independent foundation in `` brokering '' federal funds for volunteer projects .

roleset.note: BROKER-V NOTES: Frames file for 'broker' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from broker.01-v predicate notes)
